product_name: The North Face Speeder Insulated Jacket - Boys'
long_description: The North Face Speeder insulated jacket looks cool and combines a sturdy, waterproof shell with an abundance of lightweight insulation for the perfect boy's jacket for winter play. HyVent(R) polyester shell shrugs off precipitation for waterproof and breathable comfort; fully sealed seams boost weatherproofness. Lightweight 250g Heatseeker(TM) Aero insulation offers serious warmth. Hood, adjustable drawcord hem and rip-and-stick adjustable cuffs help keep out cold air and wet snow while retaining valuable heat. The North Face Speeder insulated jacket features zippered hand pockets, internal media pocket, key clip, gloves clip and goggles cloth.
short_description: The North Face Speeder insulated jacket looks cool and combines a sturdy, waterproof shell with an abundance of lightweight insulation for the perfect boy's jacket for winter play.
subcategory: Skiwear And Snowboard -- Boys And Girls
